title: Tuclikk
author: Tuclikk
content: Regarding to day by day signal Bitcoin has the most perfect signal which assure you with no loss but only profit. As days goes on, it is the only coin which has 100% of gain. Bitcoin is also a coin who's motivation has been viral, to the world. it is no more an intro to people, in the sense almost all people are already into the system because Bitcoin itself deals with the help of financial growth.

comments.author: Ruttoshi
comments.body: Quote from: Tuclikk on December 07, 2023, 07:51:08 PMRegarding to day by day signal Bitcoin has the most perfect signal which assure you with no loss but only profit. As days goes on, it is the only coin which has 100% of gain. Bitcoin is also a coin who's motivation has been viral, to the world. it is no more an intro to people, in the sense almost all people are already into the system because Bitcoin itself deals with the help of financial growth.Bitcoin price is pumping now is not a guarantee of profit all the time, the only way that profit is certain is when you invest in a long term investment for like 4-10yrs and above by using only the amount that you can afford to lose to invest regularly through DCA method. There are so many people that have made loss in bitcoin because they invested in a short term investment and some of them went into trading without knowing anything about trading. Some investors also used the amount that they can afford to lose or they borrowed money to invest in bitcoin. It is when you see bitcoin as a get rich quick scheme that you will end up running at loss because that is not how investing in bitcoin works. Nothing is 100% risk free and bitcoin is not exempted.

It seems you are referring to a different bitcoin, and not the Bitcoin we all know which is forum is created for, because when we say a coin goes 100% in gain, it simply means the coin double in price, that is for example, maybe a coin was worth $5 and it skyrocketed to $10, who h means it's gone 100% in gain, which Bitcoin  gotten such gain for quite a long while.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: It's true that many people know about Bitcoin and many have invested in it too, but there are also a great number of people around the world who have not invented Bitcoin. They might have just heard the word Bitcoin, but in reality, they don't have any significant knowledge of what Bitcoin is. Some people don't have proper knowledge about Bitcoin; they invest because of FOMO, and if things don't go as they intend to, they impatiently sell off because of price volatility. The fact that the price is still surging doesn't mean it's usually like that all the time, so it's better that investors have concrete knowledge of Bitcoin for them to make a successful investment.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: Not to demotivate you but there are many coins which has had over 100% pump and during the bullish market you will see all the coins going up but please consider the bitter pill which is best market followed by bullrun and correction phase. I remember during the end of 2017 there were many newbie who praised crypto and Bitcoin in general and invested during peak when it was over $20k and then as soon as bear run started they sold at very lesser price and started talking bad about Bitcoin when it dropped below $5k though Bitcoin recovered and reached $69k but people still said bad thing and lost their money because they were not prepared for bear market. Just be prepared to face both the sides of crypto and apart from Bitcoin no other Altcoin can pump back everytime after bear market. I ould suggest you to go through the Bitcoin market trend for atleast last two bull runs and bearish market as it will help you to have a clear mindset.
